channel.title: Comments on: GameWin – Get Free N500 MTN Airtime & More

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/gamewin/#comment-2108">Follower</a>.
Any cash reward is subjected to Raffle draw. You will be contacted if you are selected.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Follower.

Any cash reward is subjected to Raffle draw. You will be contacted if you are selected.

item.title: By: Follower
item.dc:creator: Follower
item.description: I finished the game up to the last level and I redeemed the 5k prize, but I haven't received it. Does it take longer than the usual airtime?
item.content:encoded: I finished the game up to the last level and I redeemed the 5k prize, but I haven’t received it. Does it take longer than the usual airtime?
